attributes.additional_details:
To give the people of GB there unilateral right to vote on whether they want to be a part of the European Union.

Politicians are elected to represent the views and the will of the people, not their own political agendas.

The country can no longer afford to continue bailing out Europe's mistakes in a currency we are not in.

It is sheer nonsense that we can not make our own laws in this country without the consent of the EU.

The time has come where we simply say NO NO NO!

Thankyou.
